Body:
bug = Bug()
bug.summary = 'I like foo'
responses.add(responses.GET, 'https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/rest/login',
    body='{"token": "foobar"}', status=200, content_type='application/json',
    match_querystring=True)
bug_dict = bug.to_dict().copy()
bug_dict['id'] = 123123
responses.add(responses.POST, 'https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/rest/bug', body
    =json.dumps(bug_dict), status=200, content_type='application/json')
bugzilla = Bugsy('foo', 'bar')
bugzilla.put(bug)
assert bug.id != None
responses.activate
